message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the development of human-robot systems, which falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO). The paper also proposes a framework for learning from demonstration using Bayesian inference, which is a common approach in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also emphasizes the importance of the robot being able to work fluidly with its human partners, which falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC). Finally, the paper discusses the potential impact of these systems across industry and research, which suggests a systems and control (cs.SY) perspective.
